name: Driving Theory VR
description:
This game is a vertical slice for a VR game that can help people learn the theory for their driving licence exam better.

In this game, you get two scenarios. You start each scenario in your car. On a tablet in the car, a questions is displayed. You can exit the car and walk around the scene. If you think you got the answer, you can hop back in the car and select your answer. You can also select an answer on the tablet that can be toggled on your left hand. 

A simulation of the answer you selected will be shown.
